text: draft. And banks will be stricter in recalling existing overdrafts. This is underlined in the Central Bank's weekly return... ..which shows that more than 163,00o,000 of the banks' money is now frozen in the form of special deposits with the Bank of England.
handwritten_text: draft. And banks will be stricter in recalling existing overdrafts. This is underlined in the Central Bank's weekly return... ..which shows that more than 163,00o,000 of the banks' money is now frozen in the form of special deposits with the Bank of England.
